gobblin.compaction.suite

Interface CompactionSuite<D extends Dataset>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompactionAvroSuite

    public interface CompactionSuite<D extends Dataset>
    This interface provides major components required by CompactionSource and MRCompactionTask flow. User needs to implement createJob(Dataset) method to create a customized map-reduce job. Two types of CompactionVerifiers should be provided. One is to verify datasets returned by ConfigBasedDatasetsFinder.findDatasets(). The other is to verify datasets before we run MR job inside MRCompactionTask The class also handles how to create a map-reduce job and how to serialized and deserialize a Dataset to and from a WorkUnit properly.
